acrisure_arena.summary: Guests may bring bags that are clear and do not exceed 14" x 14" x 6" with no more than two pockets, or small clutches/purses up to 4.5" x 6.5". All bags are subject to search by security upon entry. Bags with metal chains or other prohibited items are not allowed.
allowed: Clear bags up to 14" x 14" x 6" with no more than 2 pockets
acrisure_arena.note: Bags required for medical necessity or diaper bags may be allowed with leadership approval.

acrisure_stadium.summary: Acrisure Stadium requires fans to bring clear bags that do not exceed 12" x 6" x 12" or small clutches up to 4.5" x 6.5". Bags must be clear plastic, vinyl, or PVC, and all bags are subject to inspection at entry. This policy helps speed up security while allowing fans to bring necessary personal items.
allowed: Clear bags up to 12" x 6" x 12"
acrisure_stadium.note: Diaper bags with medically necessary items are allowed after inspection. Each fan may carry one approved clear bag and one small clutch or purse.

alamodome.summary: The Alamodome allows clear bags up to 12" x 6" x 12" and small clutches up to 5.5" x 8.5" to help speed up entry and enhance safety. All bags will be screened before entry. Guests are encouraged to avoid bringing bags when possible.
allowed: Clear bags up to 12" x 6" x 12"
Clear fanny packs up to 12" x 6" x 12"
Diaper bags with guardian and child
Medically necessary bags with proper screening
alamodome.note: Diaper bags must be accompanied by a guardian and child and contain childcare items; medically necessary bags larger than allowed sizes are permitted with screening. All bags, including exceptions, are subject to search. The venue reserves the right to prohibit any item deemed unsafe.

albertsons_stadium.summary: Albertsons Stadium requires fans to bring clear bags that meet size limits for faster entry and security screening. Small clutches are allowed if they fit within specified dimensions. All bags are subject to inspection upon entry.
allowed: Clear bags up to 12" x 6" x 12"
albertsons_stadium.note: Medical and diaper bags are allowed but must be inspected at security checkpoints.

allegiant_stadium.summary: All bags brought into Allegiant Stadium must be clear plastic, vinyl, or PVC and cannot exceed 12" x 6" x 12". Small clutches up to 4.5" x 6.5" x 2" are also allowed in addition to one clear bag. All bags are subject to inspection before entry.
allowed: Clear bags up to 12" x 6" x 12"
Small clutches up to 4.5" x 6.5" x 2"
allegiant_stadium.note: Medical items are allowed but must be inspected. Bag check is available for a fee with cashless payment only.

amalie_arena.summary: Bags larger than 12x12x12 inches are not allowed in the arena. Large bags, except small clutches, must go through an x-ray scanner before entry. For hockey games, bags larger than 4x6x1.5 inches require screening.
amalie_arena.note: Medical and parenting bags exceeding size limits are allowed but subject to additional searches. Bags do not need to be clear. Screening procedures vary by event type.

amerant_bank_arena.summary: Amerant Bank Arena strongly discourages bringing bags to events. If necessary, bags must be smaller than 4" x 6" x 1.5", such as small clutches or crossbodies, and all bags are subject to visual and X-ray screening. Clear bags are encouraged but not required.
allowed: Small bags smaller than 4" x 6" x 1.5"
amerant_bank_arena.note: Diaper bags, breast pump bags, and bags needed for medical purposes are allowed but subject to visual and X-ray screening. No bag storage is available inside or near the arena.

american_airlines_center.summary: Bags must be small and are subject to security screening. Clear bags are allowed but not required. Oversized bags, backpacks, and large totes are not permitted.
allowed: Clear bags up to 14" L x 6" W x 14" H
Small clutches or wristlets up to 4.5" x 6.5"
Medical and diaper bags under 14" L x 6" W x 14" H
notAllowed: Oversized bags larger than 14" L x 6" W x 14" H
american_airlines_center.note: Medical and diaper bags for small children are allowed but subject to inspection. All bags are subject to security screening. Oversized bags cannot be checked at the venue.

american_family_field.summary: Fans may bring clear single-compartment bags up to 12" x 12" x 6", small non-clear bags up to 9" x 5" x 2", or one-gallon clear resealable bags. All bags are subject to inspection, and multi-compartment or larger non-clear bags are not allowed. This policy helps speed up entry and enhance safety.
allowed: Clear bags up to 12" x 12" x 6"
Small non-clear bags up to 9" x 5" x 2"
notAllowed: Non-clear bags larger than 9" x 5" x 2"
american_family_field.note: Exceptions are made for diaper bags up to 16" x 16" x 8" and ADA or medically necessary items. All carry-in items must be inspected. Bags that do not comply will not be checked or stored by the venue.

angel_stadium.summary: All bags brought into Angel Stadium will be inspected at the gates. Fans are encouraged to avoid bringing bags if possible to speed up entry, and all bags will be subject to security screening including metal detector checks. Certain small bags and clutches may be allowed but must comply with size and screening requirements.
angel_stadium.note: Fans should arrive early to allow time for security screening. Guests with medical devices that may trigger metal detectors should notify security staff for alternative screening. Strollers and wheelchairs are permitted but must go through screening.

att_stadium.summary: AT&T Stadium only allows clear bags up to 12" x 6" x 12" or small clutches no larger than 4.5" x 6.5". All bags are subject to inspection for security purposes. Larger bags and certain types of containers are not permitted inside the stadium.
allowed: Clear bags up to 12" x 6" x 12"
att_stadium.note: Medically necessary items are allowed after proper inspection at a designated gate. Please limit the number of items you bring to the stadium on event days.

bok_center.summary: Guests may bring one clear bag no larger than 12" x 6" x 12" or one clear one-gallon plastic bag, plus one small non-clear personal item no larger than 5" x 8". All bags and belongings are subject to search and metal detector screening upon entry. Items that may cause safety concerns or disruptions can be denied.
allowed: Clear bags up to 12" x 6" x 12"
Small purses or clutches up to 5" x 8"
notAllowed: Bags that are not clear and larger than 5" x 8"
bok_center.note: Exceptions are made for medical needs and special requirements. Diaper bags are allowed when accompanied by a child.

ball_arena.summary: Ball Arena allows only small clutches, wristlets, and fanny packs measuring 4" x 6" x 1.5" or smaller. Larger purses and backpacks are not permitted. Medical and diaper bags up to 14" x 14" x 6" are allowed with proper inspection at designated entrances.
allowed: Small clutches up to 4" x 6" x 1.5"
Fanny packs up to 4" x 6" x 1.5"
Medical bags up to 14" x 14" x 6"
Diaper bags up to 14" x 14" x 6"
ball_arena.note: Medical and diaper bags must be inspected at designated entrances. Bag check lockers are available near the main entrance for a fee.

bank_of_america_stadium.summary: This venue follows a clear bag-style security policy. Check the official bag policy link for full details before you arrive.

barclays_center.summary: Bags larger than 10" x 6" x 2" are not allowed inside the venue. Guests are encouraged to travel light and leave bags at home for faster entry. All bags are subject to screening and may be x-rayed upon entry.
allowed: Small bags up to 10" x 6" x 2"
barclays_center.note: Exceptions are made for guests with medical needs and those caring for infants. Credentialed media are exempt from this policy.

bethel_woods_center_for_the_arts.summary: Guests may bring clear tote bags up to 12" x 6" x 12" or small clutch purses no larger than 5.5" x 8.5". All bags and items are subject to search upon entry for safety. Larger bags and certain items are not permitted to ensure a safe and enjoyable experience.
allowed: Clear bags up to 12" x 6" x 12"
Small hand-held cameras that fit in a pocket
notAllowed: Metal, aluminum, glass, or non-plastic reusable bottles or cans
bethel_woods_center_for_the_arts.note: A limit of two factory-sealed plastic water bottles per person is allowed. Please allow extra time for security screening at entry.
bethel_woods_center_for_the_arts.venueName: Bethel Woods Center for the Arts

broadview_stage_at_spac.summary: Only clear plastic, vinyl, or PVC bags no larger than 12" x 6" x 12" and small clutches, wristlets, or fanny packs no larger than 6" x 9" are allowed. All bags are subject to screening upon entry. No other bags of any type are permitted inside the venue.
allowed: Clear bags up to 12" x 6" x 12"
Small clutches, wristlets, or fanny packs up to 6" x 9"
broadview_stage_at_spac.note: Medical items such as medicine, prescriptions, breast pumps, and milk coolers are allowed. Strollers are permitted but not recommended due to crowd size and limited maneuverability.

bridgestone_arena.summary: Bridgestone Arena strongly discourages bringing bags to events for safety and faster entry. Bags larger than 12"x12"x6" and backpacks are not allowed. Smaller bags, including clear bags and small clutches, are allowed but subject to screening.
allowed: Clear bags up to 12" x 12" x 6"
Small bags smaller than 6" x 4" x 1.5"
bridgestone_arena.note: All bags are subject to x-ray and visual inspection. Diaper and medical bags are allowed but require screening. No on-site storage is available. Guests should arrive early and travel light. Contact the arena 24 hours before the event for special accommodations.

busch_stadium.summary: Guests may bring bags, purses, and soft-sided coolers that do not exceed 10" x 8" x 10". All bags will be inspected upon entry to ensure safety. Larger bags are not permitted to help maintain a secure environment.
allowed: Soft-sided coolers up to 10" x 8" x 10"
busch_stadium.note: Exceptions are made for medical bags and diaper bags with a child. All bags are subject to inspection at entry.

cfg_bank_arena.summary: Guests are asked not to bring bags to the arena to ensure safety and speed up entry. Clear bags no larger than 14" x 6" x 14" are allowed, as well as small clutches that do not need to be clear and must be no larger than 4.5" x 6.5". Medical bags are permitted but must be screened before entry.
allowed: Clear bags up to 14" x 6" x 14"
cfg_bank_arena.note: Items normally carried in diaper bags must be placed in a clear plastic bag for entry.

chi_health_center.summary: CHI Health Center Omaha enforces a clear bag policy requiring all bags to be clear or small clutches that meet size limits, with all bags subject to security screening. Only one bag per ticket holder is allowed to ensure safety and convenience. Bags must be easily visible during screening.
allowed: Small clutches up to 4.5 inches tall by 6.5 inches long
chi_health_center.note: Exceptions are made for medically necessary bags, which must be inspected and approved by security. This policy may not apply to Convention Center events, so check in advance if attending those. Unapproved bags must be returned to vehicles or disposed of, as staff cannot hold bags on site.

caesars_superdome.summary: Only clear bags made of plastic, vinyl, or PVC that do not exceed 12" x 6" x 12" are allowed, along with small clutch bags no larger than 4.5" x 6.5". All bags must be open and ready for screening at entry. Walk-through metal detectors are used at all gates for security.
allowed: Clear bags up to 12" x 6" x 12"
Clear diaper bags up to 12" x 6" x 12"
caesars_superdome.note: Medically necessary items are allowed after inspection and tagging. Each person may bring one approved clear bag and one clutch. Bag policy may vary by event, so check event details before attending.

camp_randall_stadium.summary: Camp Randall Stadium enforces a clear bag policy to enhance safety and speed up entry. Fans may bring one clear bag up to 12" x 6" x 12" and one small clutch purse up to 6.5" x 4.5", both subject to security screening. Other bags and larger purses are not permitted.
allowed: Clear bags up to 12" x 6" x 12"
camp_randall_stadium.note: Medical bags or equipment that do not fit in clear bags are allowed with inspection and tagging by security. Diaper bags are permitted but subject to thorough inspection. Seat cushions without pockets or compartments are allowed.

camping_world_stadium.summary: This venue follows a clear bag-style security policy. Check the official bag policy link for full details before you arrive.

capital_one_arena.summary: Capital One Arena does not allow bags, backpacks, or purses inside the venue. Small wallet-size clutches no larger than 5â x 7â and medical or parenting bags up to 14â x 14â x 6â are allowed but must go through security screening. All bags are subject to inspection to ensure safety.
allowed: Medical bags up to 14" x 14" x 6"
Parenting bags up to 14" x 14" x 6"
capital_one_arena.note: Medical and parenting bags must enter through the corner of 6th and F Street. All bags are subject to security screening and may be refused if they pose a safety risk.

chaifetz_arena.summary: Guests may bring one clear bag no larger than 12" x 6" x 12" and one small clutch no larger than 7.5" x 5". All bags are subject to inspection and must be clear plastic, vinyl, or PVC to speed entry and improve safety. Other bags are not permitted and will be returned or disposed of at the gate.
allowed: Clear bags up to 12" x 6" x 12"
One-piece foam seat cushions without pockets or zippers
chaifetz_arena.note: Medically necessary items that do not fit in a clear bag are allowed after inspection; diaper bags are allowed with a child present; no bag check is available, so prohibited items must be returned to vehicles or disposed of at entry.

chase_center.summary: All bags must be clear and meet size limits to enter the venue. Small clutches without handles are allowed if they fit within the specified dimensions. All bags are subject to screening upon entry.
allowed: Clear bags up to 12" x 6" x 12"
chase_center.note: Medical and diaper bags are allowed but must be screened.

chase_field.summary: Chase Field enforces a clear bag policy to enhance safety and speed up entry. Bags must be clear and meet size limits, with small clutches allowed if they fit within specified dimensions. All bags are subject to search upon entry.
allowed: Clear bags up to 12" x 6" x 12"
Plastic storage bags (1 gallon, resealable, clear)
Seat cushions without pockets or zippers up to 18" wide
Clothing and blankets carried loosely or in approved clear bags
chase_field.note: All bags are subject to search. Medical and diaper bags are permitted. Secure bag storage options are available for non-approved bags.

citi_field.summary: Backpacks are generally not allowed inside Citi Field to improve security and speed up entry. Permitted bags include clear bags, small purses, diaper bags (not backpack-style), totes, drawstring, and messenger bags that do not exceed 16"x16"x8". All bags will be screened before entry.
allowed: Clear backpacks with no obscured pockets
notAllowed: Backpacks (except clear backpacks or medical/ADA exceptions)
citi_field.note: Exceptions are made for backpacks used for medical or ADA reasons and backpacks purchased inside the venue during the event are allowed for that day only. There are no bag check facilities inside Citi Field.

citizens_bank_park.summary: Only clear bags no larger than 12" x 6" x 12", small clutch purses no larger than 5" x 7", medical bags, and diaper bags are allowed inside Citizens Bank Park. All bags will be inspected upon entry. Non-clear bags such as backpacks and drawstring bags are prohibited to help speed up entry.
allowed: Clear bags up to 12" x 6" x 12"
Small clutch purses up to 5" x 7"
notAllowed: Non-clear bags larger than allowed sizes
citizens_bank_park.note: Prohibited bags can be returned to vehicles or stored in lockers on Citizens Bank Way for a fee. All bags are subject to inspection following MLB security rules.

climate_pledge_arena.summary: Guests are encouraged to avoid bringing bags. If needed, one bag no larger than 14" x 14" x 6" or one small clutch/purse/wallet no larger than 4" x 6" x 1.5" is allowed. All bags larger than a clutch must go through x-ray screening at designated entry points.
allowed: Clear bags up to 14" x 14" x 6"
Small clutches/purses/wallets up to 4" x 6" x 1.5"
climate_pledge_arena.note: Medical, diaper, and parenting bags larger than a clutch must also go through x-ray screening. All bags must comply with size and prohibited items policies. Some events may restrict personal water bottles on the floor.

colonial_life_arena.summary: Only clear plastic, vinyl, or PVC bags up to 12" x 6" x 12" and small clutches up to 4.5" x 6.5" are allowed. One-gallon clear plastic freezer bags are also permitted. All bags are subject to search and bags exceeding size limits will not be allowed.
allowed: Clear bags up to 12" x 6" x 12"
colonial_life_arena.note: Medically necessary items and diapers with baby supplies are allowed after inspection and tagging. Family members, including children, may carry approved bags. All bags will be searched upon entry.

comerica_park.summary: Only single compartment bags, wallets, and clutches smaller than 4" x 6" x 1.5" are allowed. Larger bags, purses, and clutches are prohibited. All permitted bags will be searched and guests must pass through metal detector screening upon entry.
allowed: Single compartment bags smaller than 4" x 6" x 1.5"
comerica_park.note: Medical and diaper bags are allowed if smaller than 16" x 16" x 8" and needed for medical necessity such as diaper bags, breast pumps, oxygen, insulin, or epi-pens. Guests should arrive early and minimize items brought. No weapons allowed.

commonwealth_stadium.summary: Commonwealth Stadium has a no bag policy to speed up entry and improve safety. Guests may bring one clear plastic bag no larger than 12" x 12" x 6" or one small clutch no larger than 6.5" x 4.5", both subject to search. Bags that do not meet these size or type requirements will not be allowed.
allowed: Clear bags up to 12" x 12" x 6"
commonwealth_stadium.note: Exceptions are made for diaper bags and medically necessary items that do not fit in a clear bag. All bags are subject to search and enhanced screening if required.

coors_field.summary: Bags must be soft-sided, single-pocket, and no larger than 16" x 16" x 8". Backpacks, multi-pocket bags, and hard-sided containers are not allowed. All bags will be searched before entry.
allowed: Soft-sided, single-pocket bags up to 16" x 16" x 8"
Small clutches or purses fitting size limits
coors_field.note: Guests may be asked to open coats for inspection. Express lanes are available for guests without bags. Service animals are permitted.

credit_union_1_amphitheatre.summary: Only clear plastic, vinyl, or PVC tote bags no larger than 12" x 6" x 12" and small clutch bags up to 6" x 9" (which do not need to be clear) are allowed. All bags will be searched upon entry. Bags that do not meet these requirements will not be permitted.
allowed: Clear plastic, vinyl, or PVC tote bags up to 12" x 6" x 12"
Small clutch bags up to 6" x 9" (not required to be clear)
notAllowed: Non-clear bags larger than allowed sizes
credit_union_1_amphitheatre.note: Medication with prescription and matching photo ID is allowed in the amount needed for the event. Bags and items are subject to search, and refusal of search may result in denied entry. Policy may change depending on the show.

cryptocom_arena.summary: Bags, backpacks, purses, totes, clear bags, fanny packs, and camera bags are not allowed inside the arena. Small clutches and wallets smaller than 5â x 9â x 1â are allowed but subject to security inspection. Medical and parental bags smaller than 14â x 14â x 6â are permitted but must go through X-ray screening.
allowed: Small clutches smaller than 5â x 9â x 1â
Medical bags smaller than 14â x 14â x 6â
Parental bags smaller than 14â x 14â x 6â
cryptocom_arena.note: Guests with larger bags can rent lockers located near the Kobe Bryant Entrance. Medical and parental bags require X-ray screening at security.

daikin_park.summary: Daikin Park allows fans to bring clear bags that meet size requirements and small clutches. All bags are subject to screening upon entry to ensure safety. Bags that do not meet the policy may be denied entry.
allowed: Clear bags up to 12" x 6" x 12"

delta_center.summary: Bags are generally not allowed inside the Delta Center. Diaper bags and medical bags are permitted if they do not exceed 14" x 14" x 6", and small clutches are allowed if no larger than 4" x 6" x 2". All medical and diaper bags will be screened by X-ray upon entry.
allowed: Diaper bags up to 14" x 14" x 6"
Medical bags up to 14" x 14" x 6"
Small clutches up to 4" x 6" x 2"
delta_center.note: All medical and diaper bags are subject to X-ray screening at entry.

desert_diamond_arena.summary: Only small clutches, wallets, wristlets, and crossbody bags measuring no larger than 4.5â x 6.5â are allowed inside Desert Diamond Arena. Larger bags such as backpacks and purses are prohibited. Guests and bags are subject to screening upon entry.
allowed: Diaper bags (with child, entry only through Gate 1 or Gate 3)
desert_diamond_arena.note: Guests needing ADA or medical accommodations should contact Guest Services in advance. Sensory bags are available for checkout at Guest Services. There is no bag check or storage inside the arena.

dickies_arena.summary: This venue follows a clear bag-style security policy. Check the official bag policy link for full details before you arrive.

dodger_stadium.summary: Dodger Stadium requires fans to bring clear bags that meet size limits for entry. Small clutches are allowed if they meet the specified dimensions. All bags are subject to screening upon entry.
allowed: Clear bags up to 12" x 6" x 12"
dodger_stadium.note: Medical and diaper bags may be allowed but are subject to inspection. All bags must be screened before entry.

dolby_live.summary: This venue follows a clear bag-style security policy. Check the official bag policy link for full details before you arrive.

dos_equis_pavilion.summary: Only small clutches, wristlets, or fanny packs no larger than 6" x 9" and clear plastic bags no larger than 12" x 12" x 6" are allowed inside the venue. All bags are subject to search upon entry. Guests may refuse a bag search, but the venue may refuse entry if bags do not meet the policy.
allowed: Clear bags up to 12" x 12" x 6"
Fanny packs no larger than 6" x 9"
dos_equis_pavilion.note: If you have items not allowed, please return them to your vehicle. All bags will be searched at entry.

empower_federal_credit_union_amphitheate.summary: The Empower Federal Credit Union Amphitheater requires fans to bring only clear bags that meet size limits to speed up entry and ensure safety. Bags must be clear and no larger than 12" x 6" x 12" or a one-gallon clear plastic bag. Small clutches up to 4.5" x 6.5" are also allowed and all bags and items are subject to screening.
allowed: Clear bags up to 12" x 6" x 12"
Diaper bags (only with a child present)
Medical bags (must be declared and screened)
empower_federal_credit_union_amphitheate.note: Non-clear bags inside clear bags are not allowed. Items like blankets, cameras, binoculars, and phones can be carried separately without a bag. Outside lawn chairs are not permitted for Live Nation shows, but limited rentals may be available. Prohibited bags must be returned to vehicles or discarded as there is no bag check service.

empower_field.summary: Only clear bags up to 12" x 6" x 12" or small clutches up to 4.5" x 6.5" are allowed inside the stadium. All bags and items are subject to screening at entry. Bags not meeting these size or clarity requirements will be prohibited.
allowed: Clear bags up to 12" x 6" x 12"
Small clutches up to 4.5" x 6.5" (with or without strap)
notAllowed: Tinted or printed pattern plastic bags
empower_field.note: Diapers and wipes may be carried in an approved clear bag; diaper bags are not permitted. The list of allowed items may vary for concerts or other non-football events. Fans are encouraged to remove metal objects from pockets before screening. Lockers are available for a fee outside Gate 8 for prohibited items. Medical exceptions may be made with prior approval.

enterprise_center.summary: Enterprise Center requires fans to follow specific bag guidelines for entry, including size limits and screening procedures. Clear bags of certain dimensions and small clutches are generally allowed. All bags are subject to inspection upon entry to ensure safety.
allowed: Clear bags up to 12" x 6" x 12"
enterprise_center.note: Medical and diaper bags are typically allowed but may be subject to inspection. Bag policies may vary for certain events, and all guests should be prepared for security screening.

everbank_stadium.summary: EverBank Stadium enforces a clear bag policy allowing only clear bags up to 12" x 6" x 12" and small clutches up to 4.5" x 6.5". All bags are subject to inspection and screening upon entry to ensure safety and speed up entry. Bags that do not meet these requirements are not permitted.
allowed: Clear bags up to 12" x 6" x 12"
everbank_stadium.note: Exceptions are made for medically necessary items after inspection. All items and guests are subject to search. Prohibited items must be stored in lockers, returned to vehicles, or disposed of before entry.

fedex_forum.summary: Only clear bags made of plastic, vinyl, or PVC no larger than 6x8x2 inches and small clear plastic storage bags one quart or smaller are allowed. Small wallets no larger than 5x3.5 inches are also permitted. All bags and wallets will be screened through X-Ray machines.
allowed: Clear bags up to 6" x 8" x 2"
notAllowed: Bags with all-over prints or decorations that block view
Metal or chain straps on bags
fedex_forum.note: Limit one clear bag per person. Exceptions made for medically necessary items after inspection.

fenway_park.summary: Bags must be single-compartment and no larger than 12" x 12" x 6" to be allowed inside Fenway Park. Backpacks and multi-compartment bags are not permitted. All bags and personal items are subject to screening, including metal detectors or physical searches.
allowed: Single-compartment bags up to 12" x 12" x 6"
Clear bags up to 12" x 12" x 6"
fenway_park.note: Exceptions are made for diaper bags and bags with essential medical equipment. All fans and bags are subject to screening and must consent to inspection for entry.

fiserv_forum.summary: Bags smaller than 10" x 6" x 2" or clear bags smaller than 14" x 14" x 6" may be screened and allowed at any entrance. Non-clear bags larger than 10" x 6" x 2" but not exceeding 14" x 14" x 6" require x-ray screening. Backpacks, large duffles, and luggage are not permitted.
allowed: Clear bags up to 14" x 14" x 6"
Non-clear bags up to 14" x 14" x 6" (with screening)
Small bags smaller than 10" x 6" x 2"
fiserv_forum.note: Medical accommodation bags and infant/childcare bags are allowed but subject to additional screening. Additional restrictions may apply for specific events.

food_city_center.summary: Food City Center enforces a clear bag policy allowing one clear plastic bag no larger than 12" x 6" x 12" or a one-gallon clear resealable plastic bag per person. Small clutches up to 4.5" x 6.5" are also permitted. All bags and items are subject to search at entry.
allowed: Clear bags up to 12" x 6" x 12"
food_city_center.note: Medically necessary items must be searched. Diaper bag supplies should be carried in a clear bag. No items can be left or stored at the gates.

ford_field.summary: Ford Field allows fans to bring clear bags that do not exceed 12" x 6" x 12", one-gallon clear plastic freezer bags, and small clutch bags approximately the size of a hand. All bags are subject to screening to ensure safety and speed up entry. Fans are encouraged to avoid bringing bags when possible.
allowed: Clear bags up to 12" x 6" x 12"
Small clutch bags approximately the size of a hand

freedom_mortgage_pavilion.summary: Only small clutches, wristlets, or fanny packs no larger than 6" x 9" and clear plastic bags no bigger than 12" x 12" x 6" are allowed inside. All bags are subject to search upon entry, and the venue may refuse entry if a bag search is declined. Guests should return any prohibited items to their vehicle before entering.
allowed: Clear bags up to 12" x 12" x 6"
Small clutches, wristlets, or fanny packs up to 6" x 9"
freedom_mortgage_pavilion.note: Bag policy may vary by event; all items are subject to change based on the show. Guests have the right to refuse a bag search, but entry may be denied. Please check specific event rules before attending.

frost_bank_center.summary: All bags brought into Frost Bank Center must be screened and cannot exceed 12" x 12" x 6" in size. Bags larger than this are not allowed inside but can be stored at designated locations outside the arena for a fee. Security screening with magnetometers will be conducted for all guests.
frost_bank_center.note: Two storage locations are available outside the Main East Entrance and Michelob Ultra Club Entrance for $10 per bag.

geha_field_at_arrowhead_stadium.summary: GEHA Field at Arrowhead Stadium enforces a clear bag policy to speed up entry and enhance safety. Fans may bring one clear bag no larger than 12" x 6" x 12" or a small clutch no larger than 4.5" x 6.5". All bags are subject to inspection upon entry.
allowed: Clear bags up to 12" x 6" x 12"
notAllowed: Fanny packs or belt bags larger than 4.5" x 6.5"
geha_field_at_arrowhead_stadium.note: Medically necessary items are allowed after proper inspection.

gainbridge_fieldhouse.summary: All bags larger than 6" x 9" x 1.5" are not allowed inside Gainbridge Fieldhouse. Guests should travel light and only bring small bags that meet the size requirements. All bags are subject to screening upon entry.

gas_south_arena.summary: Gas South Arena requires all bags to be clear and subject to search during entry. Guests should bring clear bags or small clutches and be prepared for metal detector screening. Only small bags that meet size guidelines are allowed to help speed up the security process.
allowed: Clear bags up to 12" x 6" x 12"
notAllowed: Strollers (may be checked at Guest Services)
gas_south_arena.note: Alternative screening is available for expectant mothers, wheelchair users, or guests with medical conditions. Guests should arrive early and limit personal items to expedite entry.

gillette_stadium.summary: Gillette Stadium only allows clear bags up to 12" x 12" x 6", one-gallon clear plastic freezer bags up to 11" x 11", and small wristlets or handheld wallets up to 6.5" x 4.5". allowed: Small purses smaller than 7" x 4" x 2"
Fanny packs smaller than 7" x 4" x 2"
rogers_centre.note: All bags are strongly discouraged. Artist gifts will not be accepted. All items are subject to search upon entry.

rupp_arena.summary: Fans may bring one clear bag no larger than 12" x 12" x 6" or one small clutch purse no larger than 9" x 5" x 2". All bags and items will be searched before entry. Larger bags are not allowed and must be returned to vehicles or disposed of.
allowed: Clear bags up to 12" x 12" x 6"
Small clutches up to 9" x 5" x 2"
rupp_arena.note: Diaper bags may exceed size limits but require inspection at Guest Services. Medically necessary items are allowed after proper inspection at designated gates.

sap_center.summary: Bags should be 5â x 9â x 2â or smaller to speed up entry, but larger bags up to 20â x 14â x 11â are allowed with X-Ray screening. All bags larger than 5â x 9â x 2â must go through X-Ray inspection. Bags larger than 20â x 14â x 11â are not permitted, and no bag check is available onsite.
allowed: Bags up to 20â x 14â x 11â with screening
Parenting bags with diapers and necessities
sap_center.note: Medical and parenting bags of any size are allowed but must be screened and tagged. All bags larger than 5â x 9â x 2â require X-Ray screening. Bags must fit under the seat to avoid hazards. No bag check or storage lockers are available onsite.

schottenstein_center.summary: Bags or purses of any size are not permitted inside the Schottenstein Center. Only wallets and wristlets no larger than 5"x8"x1" are allowed. All guests and items are subject to inspection upon entry.
schottenstein_center.note: A dedicated screening lane is available for guests with medical, dietary, or childcare needs allowing one bag. Guests are encouraged to leave most items at home. Management reserves the right to determine prohibited items and may require guests to return items to their vehicle or surrender them without return.

scotiabank_arena.summary: Only small purses, clutches, or fanny packs smaller than 6.5" x 4.5" are allowed inside Scotiabank Arena. Bags that do not meet the size requirements may be subject to x-ray inspection or checked for a fee. Fans are encouraged to avoid bringing bags when possible.
scotiabank_arena.note: Bags needed for medical reasons may be allowed after x-ray inspection at designated gates. Bag check is available for $25 across from Gate 1. Policy may change depending on the event.

simmons_bank_arena.summary: All bags entering Simmons Bank Arena will be inspected. Bags larger than 14" x 14" x 6" are not allowed inside. Guests should expect security screening including walk-through metal detectors.
simmons_bank_arena.note: Weapons and other prohibited items are not allowed. Service animals are permitted with advance notice. Some events may have additional restrictions.

smoothie_king_center.summary: Only clear vinyl bags no larger than 14x14x6 inches, gallon-size Ziploc bags (one bag limit), and small clutch purses no larger than 4.5x6.5 inches are allowed inside the Smoothie King Center. All bags are subject to screening at entry. Backpacks, luggage, and strollers are not permitted.
allowed: Clear vinyl bags up to 14" x 14" x 6"
Small clutch purses up to 4.5" x 6.5"

sofi_stadium.summary: All bags brought into SoFi Stadium must be clear plastic, vinyl, or PVC and cannot exceed 12" x 6" x 12". Small clutch bags up to 4.5" x 6.5" are also allowed. All bags are subject to security screening and must meet size and material requirements.
allowed: Clear bags up to 12" x 6" x 12"
sofi_stadium.note: Bag policy may vary by event; oversized bags can be checked at bag valet locations for a fee. Service animals are permitted; emotional support animals are not.

soldier_field.summary: Soldier Field enforces a clear bag policy allowing only clear bags up to 12" x 6" x 12" or small non-clear clutches up to 4.5" x 6.5". All bags are subject to screening before entry. Bags that do not meet these size or clarity requirements are not permitted.
allowed: Clear bags up to 12" x 6" x 12"
Clear backpacks, fanny packs, and cinch bags within size limits
notAllowed: Non-approved seat cushions with pockets or zippers
soldier_field.note: Medical bags and kits are allowed but will be searched. Diapers must be carried in a clear bag. Each family member may bring one approved clear bag and one small clutch purse.

spectrum_center.summary: Only small bags, clutches, crossbodies, and wristlets that do not exceed 5in x 7in x 1.5in are allowed. This size limit applies to all bags, whether clear or not. All permitted bags are subject to visual or x-ray screening upon entry.
allowed: Small bags up to 5" x 7" x 1.5"
Crossbody bags up to 5" x 7" x 1.5"
spectrum_center.note: Exceptions are made for diaper and medical bags, including breast pumps, which must go through x-ray screening upon entry.

state_farm_arena.summary: Bags must be 14" x 14" x 6" or smaller and are subject to screening. The arena does not require clear bags. Larger bags and backpacks are not allowed.
allowed: Single-compartment drawstring bags smaller than 14" x 14" x 6"
Fashion backpacks smaller than 14" x 14" x 6"
state_farm_arena.note: Medical and diaper bags are exempt from size limits but are subject to search. Parents may bring plastic bottles of formula or milk. Bag policies may vary by event. Guests with non-compliant bags can use a paid bag check service near Gate 2.

state_farm_stadium.summary: State Farm Stadium enforces a clear bag policy allowing only clear plastic, vinyl, or PVC bags up to 12" x 6" x 12" and small non-clear clutches up to 4.5" x 6.5". All bags are subject to search and metal detector screening at entry. Bags not meeting these requirements will not be permitted.
allowed: Clear bags up to 12" x 6" x 12"
Clear backpacks and fanny packs within size limits
state_farm_stadium.note: Medically necessary items are allowed after inspection. Diapers and wipes must be in a clear bag. Blankets and additional items must be carried loosely or in an approved clear bag. No storage is available for prohibited items.

sun_bowl_stadium.summary: Sun Bowl Stadium enforces a clear bag policy requiring fans to bring only clear bags of a certain size or small clutches. All bags are subject to screening upon entry to ensure safety. This helps speed up entry and maintain a secure environment for all attendees.
allowed: Clear bags up to 12" x 6" x 12"

t_mobile_arena.summary: Bags larger than 9" x 5" x 2" are not allowed inside the venue. Only small personal bags such as fanny packs, crossbody bags, and small purses within the size limit are permitted. Bags do not need to be clear, and all bags are subject to screening.
allowed: Small personal bags up to 9" x 5" x 2"
t_mobile_arena.note: Bag check is available for a fee starting at $20 per bag; no re-entry is allowed and bags are not accessible during the event.

t_mobile_park.summary: Clear plastic bags no larger than 12" x 6" x 12" or one gallon clear plastic zip-top bags are allowed. Small clutch bags up to 4.5" x 6.5" are permitted and do not need to be clear. All bags must be see-through and contents visible for security screening.
allowed: Clear bags up to 12" x 6" x 12"
One gallon clear plastic zip-top bags
t_mobile_park.note: Exceptions are made for medically necessary items and single compartment diaper bags when a child is present. All bags are subject to security inspection.

t_mobile_center.summary: Bags larger than 12" x 6" x 12" and backpacks are not allowed inside the venue. Guests should pack lightly and expect all bags to be screened before entry. Certain items like diaper bags and medical bags are permitted but will be subject to screening.
t_mobile_center.note: All diaper and medical bags will be screened prior to entry. Guests are encouraged to check event-specific rules for any additional restrictions.

td_garden.summary: TD Garden encourages guests to avoid bringing bags to events for faster entry. Small bags such as clutches, crossbodies, and wristlets are allowed if they do not exceed 4 x 6 x 1.5 inches. All permitted bags are subject to visual or x-ray screening upon entry.
allowed: Small bags up to 4" x 6" x 1.5"
notAllowed: Oversized bags larger than 4" x 6" x 1.5"
td_garden.note: Exceptions are made for diaper bags, breast pump bags, and medically necessary bags, which are subject to additional screening. Oversized bags can be checked for a fee at the on-site Event Bag Check. Guests should allow extra time for entry and plan accordingly.

target_center.summary: Bags brought into Target Center must be no larger than 5â x 9â. Diaper bags and medical bags are allowed but subject to search upon entry. Strollers are not permitted inside the venue.
target_center.note: All bags are subject to search upon entry.

target_field.summary: Target Field allows single-compartment bags no larger than 16" x 16" x 8". Small purses, clear bags, and similar sized bags are permitted, while larger or multi-compartment bags are not allowed. Guests are encouraged to come without bags to speed up entry.
allowed: Single-compartment bags up to 16" x 16" x 8"
target_field.note: Bags containing medically necessary items and diaper bags are allowed regardless of size.

the_anthem.summary: The Anthem requires fans to bring clear bags that meet size limits or small clutches for entry. All bags are subject to security screening upon entry to ensure safety.
allowed: Clear bags up to 12" x 6" x 12"

the_armory.summary: All bags must be clear and meet size restrictions to be allowed inside The Armory. Small clutches without handles or straps are permitted. All bags are subject to screening upon entry.
allowed: Clear bags up to 12" x 6" x 12"

the_dome_at_americas_center.summary: All bags entering The Dome at Americaâs Center must be clear plastic bags no larger than 12" x 6" x 12", small clutches no larger than 4.5" x 6.5", or diaper/parent bags. All bags are subject to security screening. Bags outside these size limits will not be allowed.
allowed: Clear bags up to 12" x 6" x 12"
notAllowed: Non-clear bags larger than allowed sizes
the_dome_at_americas_center.note: Prohibited items may vary by event. All bags are subject to search upon entry.

the_pinnacle.summary: The Pinnacle allows small purses and fanny packs up to 12" x 12" x 6". Backpacks and large bags are not permitted. All bags are subject to security screening upon entry.
allowed: Small purses up to 12" x 12" x 6"
Fanny packs up to 12" x 12" x 6"
the_pinnacle.note: Empty and refillable water bottles are allowed (metal bottles are not). Certified service animals with current vaccination records are permitted. Security may deny items based on event-specific rules and safety concerns.

sphere_las_vegas.summary: Guests may bring clear bags that meet size requirements or small clutches to the venue. All bags are subject to screening upon entry to ensure safety. Larger bags and backpacks are generally not permitted.
allowed: Clear bags up to 12" x 6" x 12"
sphere_las_vegas.note: Medical and diaper bags are allowed but may be subject to additional screening. Please check event-specific rules before attending.

thunder_ridge_nature_arena.summary: Thunder Ridge Nature Arena allows clear bags and small clutches that meet specific size limits. All bags are subject to security screening upon entry. Large bags such as backpacks and duffle bags are not permitted inside the venue.
allowed: Clear bags up to 12" x 6" x 12"
thunder_ridge_nature_arena.note: Medical and diaper bags are allowed but must be checked upon entry.

toyota_center.summary: Fans are encouraged to travel light and only bring small bags no larger than 10" x 6" x 2". Diaper bags and medical bags are allowed. All bags must be screened at designated entrances before entry.
allowed: Bags no larger than 10" x 6" x 2"
toyota_center.note: Bags are subject to search at entry. Fans must use designated bag entrances for screening. Lockers are available for rent outside the arena for bags not allowed inside. Toyota Center has a no re-entry policy, so bags checked cannot be accessed during the event.

truist_park.summary: Bags are generally not allowed inside Truist Park. Exceptions include small clear bags no larger than 5 x 9 inches and small single compartment clutches. All bags are subject to screening upon entry.
allowed: Clear bags no larger than 5 x 9 inches
Diaper bags for guests with infants or toddlers
Breast pump bags for nursing mothers
truist_park.note: A mobile locker bag storage is available on Power Alley for oversized bags at a fee ($11 per bag for games, $15 for special events). Exceptions are made for ADA needs and medical-related bags.

us_bank_stadium.summary: All bags brought into U.S. Bank Stadium must be clear plastic, vinyl, or PVC and not exceed 12" x 6" x 12", or be a small clutch bag up to 4.5" x 6.5". All bags will be inspected and guests must pass through metal detectors or screening. Larger bags are not permitted and may be checked or returned to vehicles.
allowed: Clear bags up to 12" x 6" x 12"
us_bank_stadium.note: Medically necessary items are allowed after inspection at designated gates. Bag check service is available for bags exceeding policy limits.

ubs_arena.summary: Bags no larger than 12" x 12" x 6" are allowed and will be subject to screening. Backpacks of any size are not permitted. Medical and baby bags are allowed but must be screened before entry.
ubs_arena.note: Medical and baby bags must be screened before entry. Exceptions are made for guests with medical requirements or special needs who should contact Guest Services in advance.

uc_berkeley_greek_theatre.summary: Small personal bags and backpacks are allowed, but large backpacks and bags that do not fit within your personal space are prohibited. Personal seat cushions and small blankets under 40â x 60â are permitted if they stay within your ticketed area. All bags are subject to security inspection upon entry.
uc_berkeley_greek_theatre.note: Blankets must stay within your ticketed area and cannot be used to hold extra spots. Security may remove any item deemed unsafe or disruptive. No strollers allowed. Service animals are permitted.

united_center.summary: This venue follows a clear bag-style security policy. Check the official bag policy link for full details before you arrive.

utah_first_credit_union_amphitheatre.summary: Only small clutches, wristlets, or fanny packs no larger than 6â x 9â and clear plastic bags no bigger than 12â x 12â x 6â are allowed inside the venue. All bags are subject to search upon entry, and the venue may refuse entry if a bag search is declined or if the bag does not meet requirements.
allowed: Clear bags up to 12" x 12" x 6"
utah_first_credit_union_amphitheatre.note: Guests should return any prohibited items to their vehicles. All bags will be searched upon entry, and refusal of a bag search may result in denied entry.

uw_panther_arena.summary: Guests may bring clear bags up to 12" x 6" x 12", gallon-sized clear zip bags, small wristlets up to 4" x 6" x 1", or diaper and medical bags. All bags will be subject to search for safety. Private events may have different bag policies.
allowed: Clear bags up to 12" x 6" x 12"
uw_panther_arena.note: Diaper and medical bags are allowed but will be searched. Check event-specific details for private events as their bag policies may differ.

van_andel_arena.summary: Van Andel Arena has a No Bag policy that does not allow bags, backpacks, or purses except for small clutches and bags needed for medical or parenting purposes. Small clutches no larger than 4.5" x 6.5" x 2" are permitted. Medical and parenting bags must be screened by security and enter through a designated entrance.
allowed: Small clutches up to 4.5" x 6.5" x 2"
notAllowed: Any other bags not listed as allowed
van_andel_arena.note: Medical and parenting bags require additional security screening and must enter through the ADA/Box office entrance on the far west side of the main entrance. Policy may change based on the event.

veterans_united_home_loans_amphitheater.summary: All bags brought into Veterans United Home Loans Amphitheater are subject to security screening. Clear bags that meet size requirements and small clutches are generally allowed to help speed entry. Guests should expect bag checks and follow size limits to ensure a smooth entry process.
allowed: Clear bags up to 12" x 6" x 12"
veterans_united_home_loans_amphitheater.note: All bags will be searched upon entry. Please check for any event-specific bag policies before attending.

walmart_amp.summary: This venue follows a clear bag-style security policy. Check the official bag policy link for full details before you arrive.

caseys_center.summary: Guests may bring one clear bag no larger than 12" x 12" x 6", one one-gallon clear plastic freezer bag, or a small clutch no larger than 4.5" x 6.5". All bags are subject to search upon entry to maintain safety and security. Bags exceeding size limits or not meeting these criteria are not permitted.
allowed: Clear bags up to 12" x 12" x 6"
caseys_center.note: Exceptions are made for medical, family, or child care bags. All bags, including exceptions, are subject to search.

xfinity_mobile_arena.summary: Bags larger than 4.5" x 6.5" and smaller than 14" x 14" x 6" are allowed if they pass X-ray screening at designated entrances. Small clutches, wristlets, and purses up to 4.5" x 6.5" are permitted without X-ray but subject to inspection. Backpacks, suitcases, and large multi-compartment bags are not allowed inside the venue.
allowed: Bags between 4.5" x 6.5" and 14" x 14" x 6" (X-ray screened)
Small clutches, wristlets, and purses up to 4.5" x 6.5"
xfinity_mobile_arena.note: Medical and parental bags smaller than 14" x 14" x 6" are allowed after X-ray screening. Lockers are available for prohibited bags on the 11th Street side for a fee, subject to availability. All bags and guests are subject to search and secondary screening if needed.

wrigley_field.summary: Bags larger than 16 x 16 x 8 inches, including backpacks and hard-sided coolers, are not allowed at Wrigley Field. Smaller bags such as purses, drawstring bags, fanny packs, lunch bags, briefcases, and soft-sided coolers under this size are permitted. All bags are subject to inspection upon entry.
allowed: Purses smaller than 16 x 16 x 8 inches
Soft-sided coolers smaller than 16 x 16 x 8 inches
notAllowed: Bags larger than 16 x 16 x 8 inches
wrigley_field.note: Exceptions are made for medical bags and diaper bags accompanying guests with young children.

xl_center.summary: Large bags, backpacks, luggage, laptops, tablets, coolers, and similar items are not allowed inside the XL Center. Small handbags of normal size may be allowed after inspection. All bags and items are subject to search upon entry.
xl_center.note: Guests should arrive 45-60 minutes before events due to security screening. No storage or check area is provided for prohibited items. Enforcement is strict and without exceptions.

grand_casino_arena.summary: For safety and faster entry, guests are strongly discouraged from bringing bags. Purses no larger than 12â x 12â x 6â are allowed at designated X-ray entry points, and small wristlets or clutches up to 4â x 6â x 1.5â are allowed at all entrances and subject to inspection.
allowed: Wristlets, clutches, or wallets up to 4" x 6" x 1.5"
grand_casino_arena.note: Medical and parenting bags are permitted but subject to X-ray screening.

yankee_stadium.summary: Only soft-sided bags that are 16 inches by 16 inches by 8 inches or smaller, and small soft-sided personal items, are allowed into Yankee Stadium. All bags and personal items are subject to physical search and metal detector screening before entry. Guests must remove metal items from pockets for inspection during the screening process.
allowed: Soft-sided bags up to 16" x 16" x 8"
Empty reusable non-glass water bottles up to 24 oz
yankee_stadium.note: All guests, including children, must be screened via metal detectors. Infants and toddlers may be carried through, while older children may be asked to walk through on their own. Guests unable or unwilling to go through metal detectors can opt for manual screening.
